DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , randomize ( study drug assign chance ) , control study evaluate efficacy , safety effect QOL tramadol/APAP add-on therapy Filipino participant suffer chronic pain chronic osteoarthritis . Participants randomly assign 2 group : tramadol/APAP group non tramadol/APAP group . Participants tramadol/APAP group receive celecoxib 200 milligram ( mg ) fix dose combination tramadol ( 37.5 mg ) /APAP ( 325 mg ) add therapy , participant non-tramadol/APAP group receive celecoxib 200 mg . The total duration study 4 week . The participant group give celecoxib 200 mg daily 4 week . In addition , participant tramadol/APAP group give add-on tramadol/APAP dose 3 time day 4 week . Participants ask return follow-up Weeks 2 4 . Efficacy assess use 100 millimeter ( mm ) Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) QOL assess use Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) . Participant safety monitor throughout study .
